General.Name: Green Rise Capital Corp
General.Description: Green Rise Foods Inc. grows and sells greenhouse grown fresh produce in North America. The company offers tomatoes. It sells its products under Sweet Peppers, MiMi Gourmet Tomatoes, Zima, XL Beef, Wild Wonders, Honey Bombs, and Mini Kumato brand names. The company was formerly known as Green Rise Capital Corporation and changed its name to Green Rise Foods Inc. in October 2020. Green Rise Foods Inc. is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 47 Colborne Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5E 1P8
